Uses of Class
org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering.Renderer

  • Packages that use Renderer 
    Package Description
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.display
    Package for objects relating to display and ui when the 3D game is running.
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering
    A package for all classes relating to rendering.
    org.swisscheese.swisscheese.uiWindows
    This package contains all classes for Swing windows of the user interface (such as menus).

      Subclasses of Renderer in org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChunkRendererDispatcher
      A Chunk Renderer dispatcher.
      class  MultithreadedRendererDispatcher
      An abstract class for creating a Dispatcher that performs ray-casting rendering, but distributes the work load onto multiple threads for improving performance and efficiency of the program.
      class  SingleThreadedRenderer
      Display Object for rendering graphics on screen.
      class  StripRendererDispatcher
      A class for dispatching the threads to work on RenderStrip class.
